title: Account Management - Client Offboarding
description: A client has given notice to terminate their managed services agreement. The account manager must oversee the offboarding process.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the termination request and schedule an offboarding planning meeting with the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal offboarding plan is established.

tasks.description: Provide the client with a full export of their documentation, including all passwords and configurations.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client receives a complete handover of their data.

tasks.description: On the final day of service, remove all RMM agents and other management software from the client's environment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The managed service provider's access is fully removed from the client's systems.
